p: I think we've seen our way now for that visit. I'll be through the hardest part of Jed this much, and I know I can do the rest in your basement. Mama wants to be with Enat now, and of course can help a lot in various ways. Also, she needs to be near all her kids. She should soon be through with the bust, and will be free to go.

We don't plan to save anything much by the visit, for we want to keep your household budget as is. Maybe I can stop our utilities & save that much, and the coal & would save would make some difference, of course. But we dont' especially want to save anything. I've used most of the cash I had when I was there, but I'll take in about $600 before we come, and so we'll be unthinkably wealthy again.
We want to be with you solely because we want to be with you - that's what I mean.

I'll bring the legs, dynamo, shaft, & maybe a belt or two if I can find any around. Perhaps I've a grinding wheel or two that can't be used on hard stones. Mama wants to bring or send our electric washer too
We should be ready to get away not too, far from Jan 15th. I'm not sure of the time, but you'll hear, I'm looking forward eagerly.
